review: The right elevator was already not working when I got there.
Sayang lang wala food service tsaka medyo nakakaliyo ang elevator pero good choice na dito kami nagcheck in.
When I booked the hotel and paid for it days before my guest arrived, I mentioned to note a sensitive guest as those are foreigners.
Otherwise, hotel location is good.
The receptionist said since the hotel is new, television sets have not yet arrived.
We were about to stay when I noticed in the booking confirmation that the hotel did not have late check in facilities.
We were running late and with the expected traffic I was worried we'd get to the hotel and not be able to check in.
I dont know how this hotel managed by red doorz has a very high rating online when it has a very poor service.
but over all nice hotel i will stay again.
People were also accommodating she said it's a good place to stay.
The only good thing about this place is its location.
The place was ideal bec.of the loc but of poor service
The place is great and relaxing.
The place is clean, very relaxing and comfortable...
We want to request change of room due to lots of cock roaches.
When I booked my room for 2 nights, the website included in its amenities that the rooms have flat screen tvs.
The room is spacious and well tidy, I liked the LED light on the mirror inside the comfort room.
2:00pm was suppose to be our check in time yet the room was not yet ready.
After calling several times, they fixed the power and then advised to transfer again to the original room the next day.
Phone inside the room is useless because no one answered our call from their front desk area.
Lastly, the room as pictured on their sight is quite unrealistic.
The room is nice.
The room is nice but there's no chair that can be used if you want to sit and study.
and the room is boring.
Our room is clean and have a great view overlooking Manila, bathroom is elegant and clean.
So me and my partner go back to our room to take some warm water since there is a heater inside the shower room.
The room (Deluxe Queen) was “clean”— floor was sparkly, sheets white.
We were transferred to another room but then the new room has no power.
the room was very comfortable to sleep il stay for 3 nights they dont offer to clean my room or just pick up the garbage.
The room experience was excellent, special the interior design of the room and the bath room, but there is no  HOSE FOR TOILET BOWL.
